qas.question: Of what university is the Institute of Medicine a constituent college?
In what part of Kathmandu is the Institute of Medicine found?
When did the Institute of Medicine begin to offer education in medicine?

answers.text: Kathmandu University School of Medical Sciences

qas.question: What institution of tertiary education is known as NAMS?

context: Institute of Medicine, the central college of <a0_0>Tribhuwan<a0_0/> University is the first medical college of Nepal and is located in <a1_0>Maharajgunj<a1_0/>, Kathmandu. It was established in 1972 and started to impart medical education from <a2_0>1978<a2_0/>. A number of medical colleges including Kathmandu Medical College, Nepal Medical College, KIST Medical College, Nepal Army Institute of Health Sciences, <a4_0>National Academy of Medical Sciences<a4_0/> (NAMS) and <a3_0>Kathmandu University School of Medical Sciences<a3_0/> (KUSMS), are also located in or around Kathmandu.
